niacinamide.doc_title: SCCS Notes of Guidance for the Testing of Cosmetic Ingredients
niacinamide.excerpt: Niacinamide is widely used in cosmetic products and should be assessed under cosmetic safety principles.

salicylic_acid.excerpt: Use-level and population restrictions are considered in SCCS evaluations for salicylic acid.

retinol.doc_title: SCCS Opinion on Vitamin A in cosmetic products
retinol.excerpt: Vitamin A derivatives in cosmetics are reviewed for safe consumer use levels.
